meanings.definition: One who fritters away time or money.
meanings.sent1: The fritterer spent hours scrolling through social media instead of studying.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the family fritterer, always spending money on unnecessary items.
meanings.sent3: The fritterer couldn't resist buying another gadget, even though they already had one.
meanings.sent4: Like a fritterer of opportunities, he let the chance slip through his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The fritterer's pockets were always empty from impulsive spending.

meanings.definition: To fritter: to waste time or money on unimportant things.
meanings.sent1: Don't fritter away your time watching TV all day.
meanings.sent2: She tends to fritter her money on unnecessary snacks.
meanings.sent3: He would rather fritter his time on video games than study for the exam.
meanings.sent4: She frittered away her savings on frivolous purchases.
meanings.sent5: Time seemed to fritter away as they chatted aimlessly.
